```{r}
library(prob)
library(gtools)
library(tidyverse)

titanic_data <- read_csv("data/titanic.csv")

titanic_data %>%
  distinct(class)

passenger_data <- titanic_data %>%
  filter(class == c("3rd", "2nd", "1st"))

crew_data <- titanic_data %>%
  filter(class == c("engineering crew",			
                   "victualling crew",			
                   "restaurant staff",			
                   "deck crew"))
```



```{r}
crew_data %>%
  group_by(survived) %>%
  count()

passenger_data %>%
  group_by(survived) %>%
  count()
```
